casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Victor Jay CRISCO, Jr. No. 377P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Gilda C. Rodriguez, Durham, for Crisco, Victor Jay Jr. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Victor J. Crisco, for Crisco, Victor Jay Jr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*605The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of December 2015 by Defendant to Withdraw Defendant's Pro Se Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
